description:

name: FlixHQ

description: A flixclusive adapter for Stremio addons. Torrent addons, such as Torrentio,  don't work without RD or Debrid accounts.
changelog:
# Catalogs are here!

### ✨ New:
- Add support for streaming, catalog, and metadata addons.
- Add support for debrid catalog
- Make debrid movies watchable
- Add subtitles when watching debrid caches

### 📝 Changes:
- Manually load catalogs (per option) from an addon.
name: Stremio

description: A forked clone of the old movie-web.
name: Sudo-Flix

description:
